        public Tower(int towerCost,
             int initialTowerRange,
             float initialTowerFiringSpeed,
             float initialTowerDamage,
             int positionX,
             int positionY,
             processing.core.PImage CurrentTowerImage,
             processing.core.PImage fireballImg,
             processing.core.PImage[] towerImages,
             boolean isFireBall,
             boolean isIceBall)
        constructor of towers
        Parameters:
        towerCost, - cost of tower
        initialTowerRange, - initial range
        initialTowerFiringSpeed - fire ball start speed
        initialTowerDamage - tower starting damage
        positionX - tower position X
        positionY - tower position Y
        CurrentTowerImage - current tower image show on the screen
        fireballImg - either fire ball or ice ball image
        towerImages - all tower images
        isFireBall - check if it is fireball
        isIceBall - check if it is ice ball

      • isMonsterInRange

        public void isMonsterInRange(java.util.List<Monster> monsters,
                             float currentTime)
        This method is used to find the closest monster through the use of distance formula and unit vector. The start time variable appears to represent the time when the tower last fired at a monster. It's used to calculate the time elapsed since the last tower attack. When the elapsed time exceeds a certain threshold (initialTowerFiringSpeed), the tower is allowed to attack again. In essence, startTime is used to control the rate at which the tower can fire.
        Parameters:
        monsters - pass in monster list to find the target monster
        currentTime - is used to determine if enough time has elapsed since the last tower attack

      • changeTowerImage

        public void changeTowerImage()
        change towerImage when upgrade speed, range and damage levels. The boolean isFireBall and isIceBall is used to determine which image to change. These two vairbales determine the type of tower
